title: Windows10 won't open Brazil's online Banking called "Aplicativo Itaú" It is a security download from the Itaú bank. An error code SC170117
body: needs a fix to be able to continue with online banking from the US. The Itaú bank is in Brazil, South America, and I have no trouble with Windows 7 performing the task.

comments.body: Use Itaú's App, available on the store. Or use IE11. The only plugin Edge runs is Flash. And in my opinion even Flash should be dropped eventually.
